projects.name: Hands On
projects.shortDescription: A multi-platform mobile Augmented Reality (AR) application for a leading pharmaceutical brand
projects.longDescription: Hands On helped users understand the symptoms of psoriatic arthritis and how the disease progresses. The application had what was perhaps one of the most involved and layered UI designs I've implemented. I'm particularly proud of my efforts designing a theming system which allowed for efficiently re-branding the application for various trade shows, and for the design decisions that led to an easy mobile adaptation.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a rich navigation system which allowed new features to be efficiently added or rotated in
Designed and implemented a complex UI themeing system which allowed for effectively re-branding the application for different use-cases
Developed interesting User Experience (UX) features, such as an X-Ray view, informative touchpoints, and gesture controls
Implemented a complex animation system to allow for smooth visual transitions between various disease mutations that users could select
Designed and implemented a data management system to readily allow alterations to data, copy, artwork, or 3D content
Developed and managed tasks and user stories following an Agile methodology
Implemented a responsive design system to allow designs to fit a variety of mobile and tablet devices

projects.name: GoreMed AR
projects.shortDescription: An Augmented Reality learning tool for educating patients and medical professionals about various medical products
projects.longDescription: GoreMed AR is a tool to help users understand Gore's cardiovascular stents. The application features complex 3D animations and detailed human anatomy to show how and where these products go in the body. My best work on this project was designing a data management system to allow for frequent changes and updates to the available products.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a data management system to account for frequent changes and updates to the product catalog
Implemented an animation system to showcase important product features
Designed and implemented a navigation and UI system which allowed for efficient updates to the application's style and organization
Implemented a responsive design system to allow designs to fit a variety of mobile and tablet devices
Developed and managed tasks and user stories following an Agile methodology

projects.name: PEERS Distracted Driving
projects.shortDescription: A Mixed Reality driving simulation to teach students the dangers of distracted driving
projects.longDescription: Unlike most driving simulators, this was designed to be ran inside of a real car. The software needed to be able to detect the state of the steering wheel and pedals through bluetooth-enabled accelerometers attached to each, and translate that into fluid controls inside the simulation.
responsibilities: Implemented a unique control system utilizing accelerometers attached to the steering wheel and pedals of real automobiles
Designed and iterated upon this control system to provide a fluid, understandable, and friendly user experience
Developed an artificial intelligence (AI) system to provide realistic traffic and pedestrian movements

projects.name: World of Tanks AR Experience
projects.shortDescription: An Augmented Reality experience to allow users to learn about and interact with WWII-era tanks
projects.longDescription: Some really cool pieces of history are too rare or difficult to acquire, but augmented reality can help bring those artifacts to life. This is one such experience, pitting two WWII-era tanks, the T-44-100 and the Tiger I, against each other in an captivating, informative, animated experience. My work on this project helped to move it from the museum into your pocket.
responsibilities: Organized and implemented the transition of an existing 3D experience to mobile devices
Implemented user interactions and gestures to allow for a customizable user experience
Implemented various user interface elements
Developed a localization system to allow multiple languages to be supported
Implemented a conversion to Mandarin Chinese for distribution through additional channels

projects.name: CONTEC Clean Room
projects.shortDescription: A Mixed Reality instructional training tool for improving efficiency in sterilizing clean room environments
projects.longDescription: This project utilizes a tracked mop as a cursor in VR space, taking the place of a traditional VR controller. It also offers three different training modes showing users instructions, floor coverage, or testing their accuracy. I'm proud of the level of polish and interactivity I was able to include in this application.
responsibilities: Implemented a unique control system utlizing a tracked mop as a cursor in three dimensional space
Designed and implemented a navigation system to allow intuitive selection of training modes and options
Developed extensive animations and transitions to provide a compelling user experience
Implemented an algorithm to track user accuracy during the simulation
Developed and managed tasks and user stories following an Agile methodology
Performed extensive user testing and utilized feedback to improve the quality of experience

projects.name: Confidential Industrial Application
projects.shortDescription: An application to aid in a complex installation process by locating and displaying where to install parts using Augmented Reality
responsibilities: Designed, implemented, and iterated upon a state-of-the-art scanning process to efficiently gather part information
Designed an algorithm to determine part installation eligibility, based on the current state of the installation process
Designed an algorithm to determine part where parts were to be installed, based on the current system state
Implemented an Augmented Reality guide system to display the correct installation location to users
Designed and implemented a navigation and tutorial system to guide users through the installation process
Collaborated with backend team to help design an API to effectively communicate between the database and mobile application

projects.name: Exploring Game Space with Flappy Bird
projects.shortDescription: A simulation of Flappy Bird which allows for customizable game space and an auto-player
projects.longDescription: My primary task with this project was to break out the parameters of Flappy Bird into a format which a user could modify on the fly. Additionally, I worked on the AI that navigated the level and tested the difficulty of the user-generated game space.
responsibilities: Developed an Artifical Intelligence to navigate and test the difficulty of generated game space
Developed controls to allow users to set various parameters within the game space
Implemented parameterized deviation to the auto-player to better model human play

projects.name: MEMA4Kids
projects.shortDescription: An interactive mobile application to aid in children's understanding of distaster preparedness
responsibilities: Developed a video player within the augmented reality space
Developed a system to distinguish detection of multiple similar pages
Implemented user interface
